snippet.title: #BitSummit Drift Exhibit!!  獣人化少女 Animaroid Girl Trailer
snippet.description:
"Animaroid Gir" in development as an indie game will be exhibited at BitSummit Drift in 2024!! Please register your wish list on STEAM 🙏!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2545200/_/

【BitSummit Drift】
Japan's largest indie game festival, to be held at Miyakomesse, Kyoto, July 19-21, 2024.
https://bitsummit.org/

[What is Animaroid Girl?]
"Animaloid Girl" - The story of a girl who is changing from a human to a "KEMONO" and watching her coming of age.
Wishlist registration starts on the Steam store page !
Trailer movie with “Kotori Koiwai” and “DÉ DÉ MOUSE” !

PANDRI-DON is pleased to announce that the new "Animaloid Girl", a new Animaloid Girl raising adventure game" in development, is now available for wish list registration on the Steam store page.

Trailer movie featuring Kotori Koiwai and DÉ DÉ MOUSE will be released.

Please register your wish list so that you can be sure to receive information about the game, sales, and more!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2545200/_/

The story of a girl who is changing from a human to a "KEMONO" and watching her coming of age.
Would you like to live with a girl who grows beast ears, a tail, and gradually transforms into a "KEMONO"...?
This is a multi-ending "adventure game about training an Animalized girl" set in a KEMOMIMI x Hong Kong x cyberpunk world.
The fragile and pure illustrations are animated vividly in Live2D.
A variety of facial expressions, gestures, and direction color your communication with the girl and weave a story like an animation.

"Animaloid Girl" is an adventure game about training an Animalized girl.
